title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Wednesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       shed 1.24% to $475.69 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.80% to 4,704.81 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.76% to 37,430.19. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. NVIDIA Corp. closed $29.79 short of its 52-week high ($505.48), which the company achieved on November 20th. Trading volume (31.8 M) remained 9.4 million below its 50-day average volume of 41.2 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Despite protests from the bears, the calm is likely to last.
